snippet.title: Into the Crops - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Into the Crops is a PS1 style horror game made as a part of a project based learning at Multimedia Engineering, University of Alicante.
Play it for free at https://pop-corn-games.itch.io/
Made with just C++ and OpenGL from scratch, no commercial engines used.

Credits:
Jorge Marín Ferrandíz - Sound Engine, Music, AI & Gameplay
Laureano Cantó Berna -  ECS Engine & Gameplay
Yeray Mora Sobrino - Project manager, Technical Art & Graphic Engine
Alejandro Gomez Lopez - Lead 3D artist, environment & textures
Alicia Aureccia Vidal - 2D Art. Graphic Design & 3D art
